venue.name: Christ Church United, UCC, in Lowell

item.description:
GOING DEEP INTO LENT:

The 40 days of Lent call us to examine, strengthen and celebrate our relationship with God. Starting on Ash Wednesday, 2/13, for seven weeks, we gather to strengthen our relationships, and enrich our spiritual lives in preparation for receiving the Good News of Easter morning. True to CCU fashion, a video series titled "Living the Questions" will be supplemented with one-time events, such as "Enlivening Worship" (2/20, 3/20) in the Sanctuary.

5:00 Food for the Soul*
6:00 Dinner
6:30 Program

* If your schedule permits, you're welcome to help prepare a meal at 5:00. If you'd like to bring something to share (soup, bread, etc) please speak with CJ or call the church office. Your contributions would be greatly appreciated.
item.name: GOING DEEP INTO LENT
